sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: rm doc/apps/passwd.pod : We do this because otherwise openssl installs its passwd man page over the existing system one which isn't what we want.
make MANDIR=/usr/share/man make MANDIR=/usr/share/man install These commands install openssl with the man pages in /usr/share/man instead of the default which is /etc/ssl/man.

rmdir /etc/ssl/lib : This is simply a tidy-up command. For some reason, the openssl install routine creates the /etc/ssl/lib directory even though the libraries have been installed in /usr/lib . We remove it to keep things nice and tidy!
